si.title: දිවයින පුරා දින දෙකක් සරම්ප එන්නත
body_lines: அதன்படி, இன்று (20) மற்றும் நாளை (21) ஆகிய நாள்களில்  09 மாத குழந்தை முதல் 15 வயது வரையிலான சிறுவர்களுக்கு தட்டம்மை தடுப்பூசி போடப்படும்.
එන්නත් නොකරන ලද දරුවන් සෑම දිස්ත්රික්කයකම එන්නත් මධ්යස්ථාන වෙත යා හැකි බව අමාත්යාංශය පවසයි.. (වල)

en.title: Measles vaccine for two days across the country
body_lines: Accordingly, the measles vaccine will be vaccinated for children aged 9 to 15 years today (20) and tomorrow (21).
The Ministry said that children who are not vaccinated can go to vaccination centers in each district.. (N)

summary_lines: Measles vaccine campaign for 9-15 year-olds in two days. Unvaccinated children can get vaccinated at district centers.
